articles.title: Tom Petty's family issues a cease and desist order to Trump campaign - CNN
articles.description: The family of the late Tom Petty has filed a cease and desist notice to the Trump campaign after one of the musician's songs was played at the President's campaign rally in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
